title: Butternut Squash Apple Soup
summary: Butternut Squash Apple Soup might be just the soup you are searching for. This recipe makes 4 servings with 190 calories, 3g of protein, and 7g of fat each. For $1.41 per serving, this recipe covers 17% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1471 person have made this recipe and would make it again. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. A mixture of pinches of nutmeg, water, onion, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. It is brought to you by Simply Recipes. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 35 minutes. It can be enjoyed any time, but it is especially good for Autumn. With a spoonacular score of 79%, this dish is solid. Similar recipes include Butternut Squash and Apple Soup, Butternut Squash Apple Soup, and Butternut Squash & Apple Soup.
